# Integrations

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/help-articles/integrations/

## Category
17 Integrations

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
APPS & INTEGRATIONS
Apps & Integrations

You can customize Mangomint by enabling and disabling different apps, such as Memberships and Packages.

Several integration options are also available that allow you to link your account with services you may need, such as Shopify and Mailchimp.

The articles in this section cover the available apps and integrations in Mangomint.

In this section:
Managing Your Apps & Integrations
Shopify Integration
Webhooks Integration
Mailchimp Integration
WaiverForever Integration
Gift Up! Integration
Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
